entry.title: https://github.com/ChristianLempa/boilerplates
entry.content: This is my personal template collection. Here you'll find templates, and configurations for various tools, and technologies.

entry.title: https://github.com/LinkedInLearning/advanced-terraform-3099246
entry.content: This is a repo for the LinkedIn Learning course Advanced Terraform

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-backup
entry.content: Terraform module to provision AWS Backup, a fully managed backup service that makes it easy to centralize and automate the back up of data across AWS services such as EBS volumes, RDS databases, DynamoDB tables, EFS file systems, and AWS Storage Gateway volumes.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-config
entry.content: This module configures AWS Config, a service that enables you to assess, audit, and evaluate the configurations of your AWS resources.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-alb-service-task
entry.content: Terraform module which implements an ECS service which exposes a web service via ALB.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module for provisioning an ECS cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elastic-beanstalk-environment
entry.content: Terraform module to provision an AWS Elastic Beanstalk Environment

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-elasticache-memcached
entry.content: Terraform Module for ElastiCache Memcached Cluster

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-rds-cluster
entry.content: Terraform module to provision an RDS Aurora cluster for MySQL or Postgres

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
entry.content: Terraform module to configure and provision Datadog monitors, custom RBAC roles with permissions, Datadog synthetic tests, Datadog child organizations, and other Datadog resources from a YAML configuration, complete with automated tests.

entry.title: https://github.com/kube-hetzner/terraform-hcloud-kube-hetzner
entry.content: Optimized and Maintenance-free Kubernetes on Hetzner Cloud in one command!
